name: tsettps
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: sylibr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, ctps), wcel(cfv(ctopn, c2), cfv(ctopon, c1)))
stmt.pretty: sylibr(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c2 ∈ TopSp, (TopOpen ` c2)∈(TopOn ` c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, ctps))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(cfv(ctopn, c2), cfv(ctopon, c1)))
-| wb(wcel(c2, ctps), wcel(cfv(ctopn, c2), cfv(ctopon, c1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)→ c2 ∈ TopSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)→(TopOpen ` c2)∈(TopOn ` c1))
⊣ (c2 ∈ TopSp ↔(TopOpen ` c2)∈(TopOn ` c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, ctps))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(cfv(ctopn, c2), cfv(ctopon, c1)))
-| wb(wcel(c2, ctps), wcel(cfv(ctopn, c2), cfv(ctopon, c1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)→ c2 ∈ TopSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)→(TopOpen ` c2)∈(TopOn ` c1))
⊣ (c2 ∈ TopSp ↔(TopOpen ` c2)∈(TopOn ` c1))

stmt.origin: eqeltrrd(cfv(ctopn, c2), cfv(ctopon, c1), c0, wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
stmt.pretty: eqeltrrd((TopOpen ` c2), (TopOn ` c1), c0, c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(cfv(ctopn, c2), cfv(ctopon, c1)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wceq(c0, cfv(ctopn, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)→(TopOpen ` c2)∈(TopOn ` c1))
⊣ (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)→ c0 =(TopOpen ` c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)→ c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, ctps))
-| wb(wcel(c2, ctps), wcel(cfv(ctopn, c2), cfv(ctopon, c1)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wceq(c0, cfv(ctopn, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)→ c2 ∈ TopSp)
⊣ (c2 ∈ TopSp ↔(TopOpen ` c2)∈(TopOn ` c1))
⊣ (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)→ c0 =(TopOpen ` c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)→ c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wceq(c0, cfv(ctopn, c2)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cts, c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)→ c0 =(TopOpen ` c2))
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ c0 =(TopSet ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, ctps))
-| wb(wcel(c2, ctps), wcel(cfv(ctopn, c2), cfv(ctopon, c1)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cts, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)→ c2 ∈ TopSp)
⊣ (c2 ∈ TopSp ↔(TopOpen ` c2)∈(TopOn ` c1))
⊣ (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)→ c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1))
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ c0 =(TopSet ` c2)

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, ctps))
-| wb(wcel(c2, ctps), wcel(cfv(ctopn, c2), cfv(ctopon, c1)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cts, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)→ c2 ∈ TopSp)
⊣ (c2 ∈ TopSp ↔(TopOpen ` c2)∈(TopOn ` c1))
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ c0 =(TopSet ` c2)

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c2, ctps), wcel(cfv(ctopn, c2), cfv(ctopon, c1)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(ctopn, c2), cfv(ctopn, c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c2 ∈ TopSp ↔(TopOpen ` c2)∈(TopOn ` c1))
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ (TopOpen ` c2)=(TopOpen ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, ctps))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cts, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(ctopn, c2), cfv(ctopn, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)→ c2 ∈ TopSp)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ c0 =(TopSet ` c2)
⊣ (TopOpen ` c2)=(TopOpen ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, ctps))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cts, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)→ c2 ∈ TopSp)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ c0 =(TopSet ` c2)

comment: If the topology component is already correctly truncated, then it forms a topological space (with the topology extractor function coming out the same as the component). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)
